org.ldaptive.ssl

Class SocketConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.AbstractConfig
      • org.ldaptive.ssl.SocketConfig

  • public class SocketConfig
extends AbstractConfig
    Contains the configuration data for sockets.
